sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import { samplePatient } from "../utils/patientData"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; export default function Dashboard() { const [patient, setPatient] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { // In demo mode: read from localStorage userId; use samplePatient if matches or always use sample // Later, replace with API call to backend e.g. axios.get('/patient/:id') const id = localStorage.getItem("hc_userId"); // for demo, we ignore id and use samplePatient setPatient(samplePatient); }, []); if (!patient) return
Loading...
; return (
{/* Left: Bio & status */}

{patient.name}

{patient.age} years • {patient.sex}

Blood: {patient.bloodGroup}

Phone: {patient.contact.phone}

Email: {patient.contact.email}

Address: {patient.contact.address}

Emergency: {patient.emergencyContact.name} ({patient.emergencyContact.relation}) - {patient.emergencyContact.phone}

Allergies: {patient.allergies.join(", ")}

Current Status

{patient.currentStatus.status}

Since: {patient.currentStatus.since}

{patient.currentStatus.notes}

Pharmacy:

{patient.pharmacy.status}

ETA: {new Date(patient.pharmacy.deliveryETA).toLocaleString()}
{/* Center: Medical History & prescriptions */}

Assigned Doctor

Primary & Assistant

{patient.assignedDoctor.name}

{patient.assignedDoctor.specialty}

Contact: {patient.assignedDoctor.contact}

{patient.assistantDoctor.name}

{patient.assistantDoctor.specialty}

Contact: {patient.assistantDoctor.contact}

Medical History

Past visits & conditions
    {patient.medicalHistory.map((h, i) => (
  • {h.date}
    {h.condition}
    {h.notes}
    Visit #{i + 1}
    • ))}

Prescriptions

Recent prescriptions & details
{patient.prescriptions.map((p) => (
{p.doctor} • {new Date(p.date).toLocaleDateString()}
{p.notes}
    {p.meds.map((m, idx) => (
  • {m.name} — {m.dosage} • {m.frequency} • {m.duration}
    • ))}
Sent to Pharmacy
ETA: {new Date(patient.pharmacy.deliveryETA).toLocaleTimeString()}
))}
); }
